description:
Builders, assemble. Join the Ronin DevRel team for a chill evening in Prague's Old Town‚Äîjust steps away from the ETH crowd, but with better beer.

Time: Wed, May 28th - doors open at 19:30

What to expect:

* Hang out with the Ronin DevRel crew
* Get the latest on how to launch, grow, and monetize on Ronin
* Connect with other Web3 builders, founders, and game devs
* No panels, no pitch decks‚Äîjust good people and real talk

What's on tap üç∫

* Cold Czech beer & finger food
* Cozy venue in Prague's historic center
* Gamer brains, builder energy

Ronin is an EVM blockchain specifically forged for gaming. Developed by Sky Mavis, the creator of Axie Infinity which has generated over $1.3B in revenue, Ronin is the only blockchain proven to scale a single game to accommodate millions of daily active users.
